title: The Wearable Technology Show 2016
desc: T he Wearable Technology Show The Wearable Technology Show is the BIGGEST event for wearables, augmented reality, IOT and smart devices. Our conference programme has 7 different tracks, offering delegates a unique opportunity to hear from some of the leading experts in wearable technology, view the latest product demonstrations from around the world and network with the industry. Early bird tickets for the show are now available.
